gameWorld.name: Latent Space: A Quest for Q-Data
gameWorld.description: A post-cyberpunk text adventure game set in a far future where Earth is a tundra due to nuclear waste. The player must navigate the quest for the Ancient Data Artifact, an archive of wisdom holding the key to salvation.

acts.name: Act 1: The Signal
acts.description: The protagonist discovers a mysterious signal and begins the quest for the Ancient Data Artifact.

levels.name: Level 1: The Xeno-Scrambler's Lab
levels.description: The protagonist is in their lab, decoding signals and generative media when they intercept a mysterious signal.
objectives: Gather information about the Ancient Data Artifact
challenges: Navigating through the lab's security systems

levels.name: Level 2: The Frozen Wasteland
levels.description: The protagonist ventures into the tundra, following the signal's trail.

levels.name: Level 3: The Abandoned Outpost
levels.description: The protagonist discovers an abandoned outpost that may hold clues to the artifact's location.
challenges: Navigating through the outpost's maze-like structure
Hacking into the outpost's computer network

acts.name: Act 2: The Pursuit
acts.description: The protagonist faces challenges and obstacles in pursuit of the Ancient Data Artifact.

levels.name: Level 4: The Preservationist Stronghold
levels.description: The protagonist infiltrates the Preservationist stronghold to gather more information about the artifact.

levels.name: Level 5: The Enlightened Sanctuary
levels.description: The protagonist seeks the help of the Enlightened faction to decipher the artifact's location.
objectives: Gain the trust of the Enlightened leaders

levels.name: Level 6: The Sunken Ruins
levels.description: The protagonist explores the sunken ruins of an ancient city to find the artifact's hidden chamber.

acts.name: Act 3: The Revelation
acts.description: The protagonist confronts a moral dilemma upon finding the Ancient Data Artifact and makes a decision that changes the world.

levels.name: Level 7: The Artifact Chamber
levels.description: The protagonist reaches the artifact chamber and discovers the truth behind the artifact's memories and information.

levels.name: Level 8: The Latent Space
levels.description: The protagonist decides to stream the artifact's data, uploading it to the latent space and forever changing the world.
challenges: Fending off the Preservationists' final assault
